mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_todo ( userId, content, regDate, expDate, delYn ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{content}, #{regDate}, #{expDate}, #{delYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT idx, userId, content, regDate, expDate, delYn FROM t_todo WHERE userId = #{userId} AND delYn = 'N' ORDER BY idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_todo SET content = #{content}, expDate = #{expDate} WHERE idx = #{idx} AND userId = #{userId} AND delYn = 'N'
UPDATE t_todo SET delYn = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx} AND userId = #{userId}
